item.description: Smoke Odor Advisory; 08:00AM; Greater Los Angeles; Current weather conditions have led to a strong and lingering odor of smoke across the greater Los Angeles area, including the San Fernando Valley, related to a major structure fire overnight in the downtown Los Angeles area. Though the non-injury fire has been extinguished, the smoke odor is expected to continue this morning across a large area. Unless you have an emergency or can localize and offer a *specific location* for *active fire* with *visible smoke and flames*, there is no need to call 9-1-1 to report the odor.; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - Major Emergency Structure Fire 08/21/2022 INC#0181

item.description: Knockdown - Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0181; 04:20AM; 1655 E 14th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QYaNIR; #Downtown; 150 Firefighters took 83 minutes in well-coordinated defensive operations to access, confine and extinguish heavy fire within a 200' x 150' one-story metal clad commercial structure, with flames extending into an adjacent six-bay automotive storage or repair facility. Two additional adjacent commercial structures were successfully protected from fire damage. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC14 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E12 E17 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E220 E221 E226 E233 E235 E25 E27 E29 E4 E46 E9 EA1 EM1 HR3 RA17 RA3 RA803 RA810 RS3 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T15 T2 T20 T21 T26 T3 T33 T35 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 1 13 14 15; Brian Humphrey

Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0181; 03:51AM; 1655 E 14th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QYaNIR; #Downtown; With 150 Firefighters assigned in defensive operations, this fire has escalated to a 'Major Emergency' incident with fire throughout a 200' x 150' one-story metal clad commercial structure, extending into an adjacent six-bay automotive storage or repair facility. Two additional adjacent commercial structures have successfully been protected from the intense flames. The firefight continues with no civilian or responder injuries reported.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC14 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E12 E17 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E220 E221 E226 E233 E235 E25 E27 E29 E4 E46 E9 EA1 EM1 HR3 RA17 RA3 RA803 RA810 RS3 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T15 T2 T20 T21 T26 T3 T33 T35 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 1 13 14 15; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0181; 02:57AM; 1655 E 14th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QYaNIR; #Downtown; PRELIM: 100' x 75' one story metal clad commercial structure well involved, with other structures threatened.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC14 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E17 E202 E203 E209 E210 E226 E27 E4 E9 EM1 HR3 RA17 RA3 RA803 RA810 T10 T2 T26 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Automobile Fire - FATALITY; INC#1808; 10:26PM; Nb 110 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Acjfh2; Lincoln Heights; One patient determined deceased, inside the burned out vehicle. Age/gender unknown. LAFD Arson is onscene to investigate the cause in coordination with CHP. CHP Log #2939. No further details ; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC2 E1 RA1 RA20; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1114; 03:30PM; 10052 N Chapin Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PAfuaL; Sunland; KNOCKDOWN: 24 firefighters extinguished the fire in 33 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire originated in an exterior storage shed and extended into the attic. Firefighters prevented the fire from extending down into the living area. No injuries reported. No further details.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 E24 E274 E298 E77 RA74 T74 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1114; 02:57PM; 10052 N Chapin Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PAfuaL; Sunland; One story, single family dwelling with smoke showing on arrival. Upon making entry, firefighters located a well established attic fire and are in the offensive mode while also conducting salvage operations to minimize damage to property. All occupants were out of the structure prior to LAFD arrival.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 E24 E274 E298 E77 RA74 T74 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - FATALITIES; INC#0210; 04:14AM; 261 W Manchester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3dIJdB9; Florence; A four car traffic collision resulted in one patient with minor injuries (no hospital transport) and two patients determined dead on scene (age/gender unknown). All media queries are directed to LAPD Traffic Division Inc #0560. No further details.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; E233 RA257 RA33 RA833 T33; CH4; Margaret Stewart

Fire Out - FATALITY; INC#0200; 04:05AM; 361 W 88th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PP0uGl; Broadway-Manchester; Firefighters responded to a 'fire out' and located a deceased person whose body had been on fire. LAFD Arson, LAPD and LA County Coroner are conducting a joint investigation. Age / gender unknown. There are no further details available. ; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; AR1 E33 EM13 RA57; CH4; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#1189; 05:47PM; 238 S Av 64; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pvdDJO; Highland Park; KNOCKDOWN: Over 80 firefighters battled extremely steep terrain to get hand lines around the fire while LAFD Air Ops laid in strategic water drops. The combined efforts successfully extinguished the fire and prevented any structures from damage. No injuries reported. Crews will remain on scene for an undetermined period to continue mopping up the hot spots. No injuries reported. No further details.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC11 BC2 CE83 CM20 CM22 CW3A CW3B E1 E11 E12 E16 E201 E209 E210 E212 E220 E290 E42 E44 E47 E55 E56 E90 EA1 EM1 F114 H3 H4 H5 HA3 HA4 HA5 HT1 RA12 RA55 T1 T10 T12 T20 T90; CH5; 13; Margaret Stewart
